column1: The valley looks more interesting in the rain... don't you think?
column2: 雨天的星露谷別有一番滋味……你說呢？

column1: The rain doesn't stop me from getting a job done!
column2: 大雨不能阻止我完成工作！

column1: Although soggy wood isn't a joy to work with.
column2: 不過潮濕的木材很難處理。

column1: Greetings. Stay inside if you want to keep warm.
column2: 你好。想取暖的話就待在室內吧。

column1: When it rains I have a good excuse to work on my gadgets all day.
column2: 下雨天我就有理由整天弄一些小東西了。

column1: It must be kind of boring for you, though.
column2: 不過這對你來說應該有點無聊。

column1: If you're lucky, you might see a frog in this weather.
column2: 運氣好的話，這種天氣可能會看見青蛙。

column1: A warm rain is a pleasant way to get clean.
column2: 暖暖的雨很適合當作沐浴。

column1: Most people stay indoors on days like this... It's not good for business.
column2: 這種天氣很多人都待在家裡……生意不好做啊。

column1: My garden is happy today.
column2: 今天我的花花草草們一定很開心。

column1: ...and our water bill will be lower this month.
column2: ……而且我們這個月的水費也會比較低。

column1: Hmmph. This is not good weather for sports.
column2: 唔。這種天氣不適合運動。

column1: Oh well, I can always lift weights inside.
column2: 哦，不過在室內還是可以練習舉重的。

column1: It's awful cold, isn't it? What a rotten day.
column2: 天氣也太冷了吧？日子真難熬啊。

column1: When I woke up I heard dripping from somewhere... I think the roof might be leaking.
column2: 我一醒來就聽到哪裡在滴水……應該是屋頂漏水了。

column1: In the old days, George would've scampered right up and fixed it... *sigh*
column2: 喬治以前都會馬上爬上去修好……唉……

column1: Hi there, @. Taking a break?
column2: 你好啊，@。今天可以偷個閒吧？

column1: I hope the river doesn't overflow...
column2: 希望河水不會氾濫……

column1: Today would be a good day to explore the mines... Who knows, you might find some rare ores.
column2: 今天是探索礦坑的好日子……說不定能夠找到一些稀有的礦石。

column1: The raindrops are really loud on the metal roof of our trailer.
column2: 雨滴打在我們房車的金屬車頂上的聲音非常響亮。

column1: ...It's soothing, though.
column2: ……不過挺好聽的。

column1: Howdy, kid. Stayin' dry?
column2: 孩子，你好啊。沒淋濕吧？

column1: It never rains in Calico Desert... That's where my friend Sandy lives.
column2: 卡利科沙漠從不下雨……我朋友沙蒂就住在那裡。

column1: I wish I could've visited her today.
column2: 真希望今天能去看她。

column1: I spent all morning doing my hair... now the rain could mess it up.
column2: 我花了一整個早上弄頭髮……結果一場大雨就給我毀了。

column1: *sigh* ... Life is hard sometimes.
column2: 唉……人生有時真難。

column1: Did you wipe your boots off before coming in? Sorry... I just cleaned the floor.
column2: 你進來之前有把靴子擦乾淨嗎？抱歉……我剛剛才擦過地板。

column1: But you're always welcome in here! Heh.
column2: 不過這裡隨時歡迎你哦！呵呵。

column1: Rain muffles sound, so I can play my guitar louder without my Mom getting mad. Hehe.
column2: 雨聲這麼大，就算我吉他彈大聲一點我媽也不會生氣，嘿嘿。

column1: Maybe I should cook something new and exciting today. Something spicy.
column2: 也許我今天該煮一些新鮮刺激的菜。辣菜好像挺不錯的。

column1: Hmm... this weather makes me thirsty.
column2: 嗯……這天氣讓我覺得很乾渴。

column1: Hi @. You look like you're soaked...you poor thing!
column2: 嗨，@。你都成落湯雞了……可憐的孩子！

column1: Sometimes when I lay in bed I can hear a distant foghorn cut through the rain.
column2: 有時我躺在床上會聽見遠方船隻的霧笛聲穿梭在雨中。

column1: But when I look out the window I see only a curtain of gray.
column2: 但是望出窗外卻只看見灰濛濛的一片。

column1: There's nothing like a glass of dry red wine on a day like this, huh?
column2: 這種天氣最適合來一杯乾澀的紅酒了，對吧？

column1: I love my job. Hehehe.
column2: 我愛死我的工作了，嘿嘿嘿。

column1: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us dwarves live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
column2: 雨……對我們來說就像神話故事一樣。有些矮人甚至一輩子都沒見過下雨。

column1: Stormy days are the only time I can commune with certain elementals.
column2: 暴雨天是我跟某些元素溝通的唯一機會。

column1: I don't expect you to understand.
column2: 你不會明白的。

column1: Hi @! Er... Read anything interesting in the library lately?
column2: 嗨，@！呃……最近在圖書館有發現什麼好書嗎？

column1: Heh. Well, um... I'll see you around then?
column2: 嘿。那個，呃……下次再聊？

column1: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?
column2: 聽說家鄉在下雨，你是為了避雨才跑來這裡嗎？

column1: I kind of miss the rain, actually...
column2: 話說我有點懷念雨景了……

column1: Ah, the sewers are flowing quickly today. It'll get nice and humid in here... Just how I like it.
column2: 啊，今天下水道水量很大。這裡會變得十分潮濕……就像我喜歡的那樣。

column1: The valley is peaceful when it rains.
column2: 下雨時山谷裡很平靜……

column1: To me... nature is someone I know, with different moods.
column2: 對我來說……大自然就像是一個熟人，有著不同的情緒。
